properties.description: Select a three letter iso639-2b language code from this list. Use zxx if there is no linguistic content.
properties.title: Language

properties.description: ASC Number, call number, or other local YUL identifier
properties.title: Identifier (local)

properties.description: Make note of any funding or sponsorship involved in the digitization, migration or preservation of this object. For stock phrases, see FAQ.
properties.title: Funding

properties.description: Name of a country, i.e. a political entity considered a country.
properties.title: Country

properties.description: Includes first order political divisions called provinces within a country, e.g. in Canada.
properties.title: Province

properties.description: Includes regions that have status as a jurisdiction, usually incorporating more than one first level jurisdiction.
properties.title: Region

properties.description: Name of the largest local administrative unit in various countries, e.g. England.
properties.title: County

properties.description: Name of an inhabited place incorporated as a city, town, etc.
properties.title: City

properties.description: Name of a smaller unit within a populated place, e.g., neighborhoods, parks, or streets.
properties.title: City Section

properties.description:
Please put coordinates in decimal format: 43.653333, -79.383889

DO NOT use degree format 43°39′12″N 079°23′02″W
properties.title: Coordinates

properties.description: Provide a descriptive statement regarding the physical extent of the object being described, following the conventions established in RAD 1.5B. See FAQ for examples based on format.
properties.title: Extent

properties.description: Provide a designation of the particular physical presentation of the resource being described, focused on physical form or medium of material used to create a resource.
properties.title: Form

properties.description: Select the form source code from which you derived your term from this list. Example: gmgpc
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: For guidance in attributing copyright, see FAQ
properties.title: Rights and Access
